# The `WebAssemblyMCInstLower.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file contains code to lower <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly">WebAssembly</a> MachineInstrs to their corresponding <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> records. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/bittracker-cpp/#ae3e523a6a11b1e24604b40363978a62a">BT</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly/#a9ebf832762357f1668dbc7fd07668de4">WebAssembly::BlockType</a></span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a38b28a85f818b49d8806c150b8a5b4f7">getImm</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/bittracker-cpp/#ae3e523a6a11b1e24604b40363978a62a">BT</a> != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly/#a9ebf832762357f1668dbc7fd07668de4a4bbb8f967da6d1a610596d7257179c2b">WebAssembly::BlockType::Invalid</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/bittracker-cpp/#ae3e523a6a11b1e24604b40363978a62a">BT</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly/#a9ebf832762357f1668dbc7fd07668de4a934729080de1f9b454fd9776c7711c82">WebAssembly::BlockType::Multivalue</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;wasm::ValType, 2&gt;</a> Returns;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Multivalue blocks are emitted in two cases:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 When the blocks will never be exited and are at the ends of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    functions (see</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    WebAssemblyCFGStackify::fixEndsAtEndOfFunction). In this case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    the exact multivalue signature can always be inferred from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    return type of the parent function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 (catch&#95;ref ...) clause in try&#95;table instruction. Currently all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    tags we support (cpp&#95;exception and c&#95;longjmp) throws a single</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    pointer, so the multivalue signature for this case will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    (ptr, exnref). Having MO&#95;CATCH&#95;BLOCK&#95;SIG target flags means</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    this is a destination of a catch&#95;ref.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ab06dda088d3c7686f7dfcdb2b96323f5">getTargetFlags</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassemblyii/#abc4159c7cedfb271e97400a8c3503bfaa6eddef61365ef3611cecf700781d9eae">WebAssemblyII::MO&#95;CATCH&#95;BLOCK&#95;SIG</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">              Returns = &#123;PtrTy, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/wasm/#a0ef8084534e2fa2859faac16914a7ff8a429e2e7f86760397481df696c53a6bb3">wasm::ValType::EXNREF</a>&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">              <a href="#acb6072515fd1f1d28b42c3de8524b501">getFunctionReturns</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, Returns);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">            MCOp = lowerTypeIndexOperand(std::move(Returns),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;wasm::ValType, 4&gt;</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MCOp = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcoperand/#a595e70d3c4ee2ed95ece67a1957167a4">MCOperand::createImm</a>(MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a38b28a85f818b49d8806c150b8a5b4f7">getImm</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
